additional.message_body:
Hello Deletha,

 

Hope you are doing great!  I just wanted to follow up with you regarding purchasing the [organization_name] Glass Whiteboard on [organization_name].  We have also sent you money in advance by Paypal to purchase the [organization_name] Glass Whiteboard which you have already received.

 

We understand that you may be busy and were not able to make the purchase earlier, but we give out a fixed amount of rebates to influencers like you and have scheduled the purchases accordingly so the impact of our influencer outreach campaign can be maximized.  For this reason, we request that all influencers who have agreed to collaborate should purchase the product within a maximum of three days from the day we send you the money by Paypal.

 

We are really looking forward to working with you and want the  [organization_name] Glass Whiteboard to be delivered to you as soon as possible so you can create the post for us.

 

Please send me the [organization_name] Order ID as soon as you have made the purchase and let me know if you have any questions.

 

Thank you,

Cynthia

Hello Deletha,

 

Seems like you may be very busy and did not get time to reply to our emails we sent over the past few days.  

 

In case you are still not able to purchase the whiteboard, then please go ahead and refund the money we sent you back to our Paypal account.  Unfortunately, Paypal requires that we give them confirmation of purchase after a certain time period otherwise it will create a case to get the money back which we do not want  to do as that may affect your Paypal profile.

 

So please get back to us so we can manage this in a timely manner.

 

Thank you,

 

Cynthia

Hello Deletha,

 

Hope you are well and safe.  I wanted to follow up to our last message to you to which we have unfortunately not received a response from you.  As noted, we have offered to send you the money in advance in good faith so you can purchase the  [organization_name] Glass Whiteboard as you agreed.  Unfortunately, we have not heard back from you since we have sent you the money and you have not yet purchased the whiteboard.

 

Please get back to us by regarding this so we can move forward with our agreement.

 

Regards,

Hey :)




My name is Cynthia. I am the social media manager at [organization_name]. We are an Office / Home Office related brand selling our products mainly through [url]




I am contacting you because we are looking for influencers for our newly launched Magnetic Glass Whiteboard. After looking through your Instagram feed I think your content style and audience might be a good match for our brand.




If you’d be interested in collaborating and doing an Instagram post in exchange for a free product please reply and we will send you more details about this.




Thanks for your time!




Cynthia

Hi,

 

Thanks for getting back to me! I am glad you’re interested in doing a collab!

 

Since this is a newly launched product, we only sell the [organization_name] Magnetic Glass Whiteboard on [url] at the moment - you can find it here:

 

[url]

 

This is how it looks like:

 

If you like it and if you think it would be a good match for your audience I can send you a rebate in advance for the product price, or if you buy it first and send me the order ID or receipt for accounting I can also rebate the cost of shipping and sales tax.

 

Let me know how this sounds :) And if you’re happy to proceed just send me your Paypal details for the rebate.

 

Thank you!

Cynthia
Yes that will be perfect for me as I have children who need chores delegated

Hi,

Thanks for your response.


If you are interested, then please send me your PayPal details so that we can send you a rebate.


Regards,



Cynthia

Hello,

Thank you for accepting to collaborate with us.

You should have just received [organization_name] on Paypal from this email address: [email_address] (I sent a little more to cover any Paypal fees)

The money is your reimbursement (sent in advance) for buying the [organization_name] Glass Whiteboard on [organization_name].

Please go to the following link to buy the product and then please reply with your order ID:

[url]  

PRODUCT IMAGE:

 

Please make sure you purchase the correct product: 

Brand: [organization_name]

Price: [financial_data]

Once you have made the purchase, please send us your [organization_name] Order ID so we can confirm and let you know when the item is shipped.

Thank you!

Cynthia
